Field Detail

cached_data

private utilities.DoubleLinkedList<Cachable> cached_data
Double Linked List --

Worst Case Scenario for finding a sorted ID in the cache table: (O) n / 2
Faster Inserting and Removing of objects, optimizing cache response time.

flush_stamp

private java.util.Date flush_stamp
Date when last cache flush occured. If greater than the specified routine flush time, Broker knows that an error has occured such as a power failure upon request to flush. This should be logged to an error log.

Constructor Detail

CacheTable

CacheTable()
Method Detail

removeFromCache

private int removeFromCache(int id)
Method to remove an item from cache. Probably won't be used while the system is in a work environment because it's undesirable to not have items cached when they are used.

Parameters:
id - int id to remove from cache
Returns:
error code int
-1: Method failed, Error occured. 0 : Item successfully removed from cache 1 : ID specified not found

getCachablesToFlush

private Cachable[] getCachablesToFlush()
Returns all the objects required to flush with each call. Should be called via a thread in each Broker object.

Returns:
Array of objects to save in backend.
